input.sentences: the water was way up today . almost taking over .
the part of the water that we finally could get the boat into to go sailing .
saw a few natives along the way ... good thing they are friendly ... haha .
look at the different colors of the ocean . almost looks like a painting .
output.sentences: The ancienct river of Gambia had been theirs for the taking.
This all changed after the river became flooded.
While they thought they could finally control the river's water, a rival tribe with superior sailing skills invaded.
The cheif brushed it off with a light-hearted "haha" hoping these invaders would be friendly to the natives.
Luckily they were, and simply wanted to paint, comparing their ocean colors to the flooded ancient river.
